long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The harmful rays of the internet can sometimes sneak up on you and into your delicate computer. Sun Screen makes sure that doesn't happen and will block whatever site you find yourself drifting onto now and again. We've used The Sun for dramatic effect for the happy coincidence of a name, but feel free to remove this if you love reading the sun, and add whatever site you please.
